data.neighbors

Class SyntheticKNNExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.neighbors.SyntheticKNNExtender

  • public class SyntheticKNNExtender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the methods for improving the estimates in the neighbor occurrence models by introducing synthetic data points as queries and querying the original dataset more times.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SyntheticKNNExtender(DataSet dset, int k, CombinedMetric cmet, int numClasses)
      Initialization.

    • Method Summary

      Calculate the kNN sets on the synthetic data extension.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SyntheticKNNExtender

        public SyntheticKNNExtender(DataSet dset,
                    int k,
                    CombinedMetric cmet,
                    int numClasses)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        dset - DataSet object to extend and improve the occurrence estimates on.
        k - Integer that is the neighborhood size.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.

    • Method Detail

      • getSyntheticOccFreqs

        public int[] getSyntheticOccFreqs()
        Returns:
        int[] that is the additional occurrence frequencies of the original points on the synthetic Gaussian extension of the data.

      • getSyntheticGoodOccFreqs

        public int[] getSyntheticGoodOccFreqs()
        Returns:
        int[] that is the additional good occurrence frequencies of the original points on the synthetic Gaussian extension of the data.

      • getSyntheticBadOccFreqs

        public int[] getSyntheticBadOccFreqs()
        Returns:
        int[] that is the additional bad occurrence frequencies of the original points on the synthetic Gaussian extension of the data.

      • getSyntheticClassConditionalOccCounts

        public float[][] getSyntheticClassConditionalOccCounts()
        Returns:
        float[][] that is the additional class-conditional neighbor occurrence frequencies of the original points on the synthetic Gaussian extension of the data.

      • extendData

        public void extendData(int numSyntheticPoints)
        Extends the data for evaluating the occurrence frequencies of the original data points.
        Parameters:
        numSyntheticPoints - Integer that is the number of additional points to generate.

      • calcSyntheticNSets

        public void calcSyntheticNSets()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the kNN sets on the synthetic data extension.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
